singleItemContent: p>What was your first mobile phone?
p>How often do you use your mobile phone?
p>Do you use your mobile phone for texting or calls?
p>Can you describe your mobile phone?
p>Will you buy a new mobile phone in the future?
p>How has your mobile phone changed your life?
p>Describe a happy event you organized.
p>Who helped you to organize it
p>And explain how you feel about it
p>How can parents help children to become organized?
p>What factors should people consider while organising events?
p>On what occasions are people organized?
p>What are the occasions people have parties for?
p>What public events are celebrated in your area, and what do you think about them?
